questions.question: Which keyword declares a block-scoped variable in modern JavaScript?
questions.explanation: let and const are block-scoped; var is function-scoped.

questions.question: What will be output by: console.log(typeof NaN);
Which method converts JSON text into a JavaScript object?
questions.explanation: JSON.parse converts JSON strings into objects.

questions.question: How do you write a comment in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: JS supports single-line // and multi-line /* */ comments.
